Into the Depths V.name: Into the Depths V
Into the Depths V.description: Complete the Week 5 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager V.name: Front Line Salvager V
Front Line Salvager V.description:
Complete 8 bounties from the Sonar Station in the H.E.L.M.

Additionally, defeat powerful combatants anywhere in the system.

Heavy Salvager.name: Heavy Salvager
Heavy Salvager.description: Defeat combatants with Power weapons in Salvage activities.

Prepared for War.name: Prepared for War
Prepared for War.description: Defeat targets with Hand Cannons or Pulse Rifles. Defeated Guardians or combatants defeated in Salvage or Deep Dive activities grant additional progress.

Battle Rhythm.name: Battle Rhythm
Battle Rhythm.description: Defeat targets anywhere in the system while using Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, or Linear Fusion Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Gotta Win Them All.name: Gotta Win Them All
Gotta Win Them All.description: Complete activities in Vanguard, Gambit, or Crucible playlists. Bonus progress is granted for completing Vanguard playlist activities at Hero difficulty or higher, or for winning Gambit or Crucible matches.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Iron Sharpens Iron.name: Iron Sharpens Iron
Iron Sharpens Iron.description: Complete Iron Banner matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.
